Package com.onlinepayments.sdk.client.android.session

Class Session

java.lang.Object
com.onlinepayments.sdk.client.android.session.Session
All Implemented Interfaces:
BasicPaymentItemsAsyncTask.BasicPaymentItemsCallListener, BasicPaymentItemsAsyncTask.OnBasicPaymentItemsCallCompleteListener, BasicPaymentProductsAsyncTask.BasicPaymentProductsCallListener, BasicPaymentProductsAsyncTask.OnBasicPaymentProductsCallCompleteListener, IinLookupAsyncTask.IinLookupCompleteListener, IinLookupAsyncTask.OnIinLookupCompleteListener, PaymentProductAsyncTask.OnPaymentProductCallCompleteListener, PaymentProductAsyncTask.PaymentProductCallListener, Serializable
public class Session extends Object implements Serializable, BasicPaymentProductsAsyncTask.OnBasicPaymentProductsCallCompleteListener, IinLookupAsyncTask.OnIinLookupCompleteListener, PaymentProductAsyncTask.OnPaymentProductCallCompleteListener, BasicPaymentItemsAsyncTask.OnBasicPaymentItemsCallCompleteListener, BasicPaymentItemsAsyncTask.BasicPaymentItemsCallListener, BasicPaymentProductsAsyncTask.BasicPaymentProductsCallListener, PaymentProductAsyncTask.PaymentProductCallListener, IinLookupAsyncTask.IinLookupCompleteListener
Session contains all methods needed for making a payment.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • Session

      public Session(String clientSessionId, String customerId, String clientApiUrl, String assetBaseUrl, boolean environmentIsProduction, String appIdentifier)
      Creates a Session object. Use this object to perform Client API requests such as get Payment Products or get IIN Details.
      Parameters:
      clientSessionId - used for identifying the session on the Online Payments gateway
      customerId - used for identifying the customer on the Online Payments gateway
      clientApiUrl - the endpoint baseurl
      assetBaseUrl - the asset baseurl
      environmentIsProduction - states if the environment is production
      appIdentifier - used to create device metadata

    • Session

      public Session(String clientSessionId, String customerId, String clientApiUrl, String assetBaseUrl, boolean environmentIsProduction, String appIdentifier, boolean loggingEnabled)
      Creates a Session object. Use this object to perform Client API requests such as get Payment Products or get IIN Details.
      Parameters:
      clientSessionId - used for identifying the session on the Online Payments gateway
      customerId - used for identifying the customer on the Online Payments gateway
      clientApiUrl - the endpoint baseurl
      assetBaseUrl - the asset baseurl
      environmentIsProduction - states if the environment is production
      appIdentifier - used to create device metadata
      loggingEnabled - indicates whether requests and responses should be logged to the console; default is false; should be false in production

    • getBasicPaymentItems

      @Deprecated public void getBasicPaymentItems(android.content.Context context, PaymentContext paymentContext, BasicPaymentItemsAsyncTask.OnBasicPaymentItemsCallCompleteListener listener, boolean groupPaymentProducts)
      Deprecated.
      use getBasicPaymentItems(Context, PaymentContext, boolean, BasicPaymentItemsResponseListener) instead.
      Gets all BasicPaymentItems for a given PaymentContext.
      Parameters:
      context - used for reading device metadata which is sent to the Online Payments gateway
      paymentContext - PaymentContext which contains all necessary payment data for making a call to the Online Payments gateway to get the BasicPaymentItems
      listener - BasicPaymentItemsAsyncTask.OnBasicPaymentItemsCallCompleteListener that will be called when the BasicPaymentItems are retrieved
      groupPaymentProducts - a Boolean that controls whether the getBasicPaymentItems call will group the retrieved BasicPaymentItems; true for grouping, false otherwise

    • getBasicPaymentItems

      @Deprecated public void getBasicPaymentItems(android.content.Context context, PaymentContext paymentContext, BasicPaymentItemsAsyncTask.BasicPaymentItemsCallListener listener, boolean groupPaymentProducts)
      Deprecated.

      Gets all BasicPaymentItems for a given PaymentContext.

      paymentContext - PaymentContext which contains all necessary payment data for making a call to the Online Payments gateway to get the BasicPaymentItems
      listener - BasicPaymentItemsAsyncTask.BasicPaymentItemsCallListener that will be called when the BasicPaymentItems are retrieved
      groupPaymentProducts - a Boolean that controls whether the getBasicPaymentItems call will group the retrieved BasicPaymentItems; true for grouping, false otherwise

    • getPublicKey

      public void getPublicKey(android.content.Context context, PublicKeyResponseListener listener)
      Retrieves the public key as a PublicKeyResponse from the the Client API. The key will be returned through the provided listener's onSuccess() method. In case of an error or exception, onError or onException will be invoked.
      Parameters:
      context - Used for reading device metadata.
      listener - The listener interface that will be invoked when the request completes.

    • preparePaymentRequest

      Prepares a PreparedPaymentRequest from the supplied PaymentRequest.
      Parameters:

      listener - SessionEncryptionHelper.OnPaymentRequestPreparedListener that will be called when the PreparedPaymentRequest is created

    • getSurchargeCalculation

      public void getSurchargeCalculation(android.content.Context context, AmountOfMoney amountOfMoney, String partialCreditCardNumber, Integer paymentProductId, SurchargeCalculationResponseListener listener)
      Retrieves the Surcharge Calculation as a SurchargeCalculationResponse for the provided amount of money, partial credit card number and payment product ID.
      Parameters:
      context - used for reading device metadata which is sent to the Online Payments gateway
      amountOfMoney - contains the amount and currency code for which the Surcharge should be calculated
      partialCreditCardNumber - the partial credit card number for which the Surcharge should be calculated
      paymentProductId - the id of the product for which the Surcharge product type should be determined, can be null
      listener - SurchargeCalculationResponseListener that will be called when the SurchargeCalculationResponse is retrieved

    • getSurchargeCalculation

      public void getSurchargeCalculation(android.content.Context context, AmountOfMoney amountOfMoney, String token, SurchargeCalculationResponseListener listener)
      Retrieves the Surcharge Calculation as a SurchargeCalculationResponse for the provided amount of money and token.
      Parameters:
      context - used for reading device metadata which is sent to the Online Payments gateway
      amountOfMoney - contains the amount and currency code for which the Surcharge should be calculated
      token - the token for which the Surcharge should be calculated
      listener - SurchargeCalculationResponseListener that will be called when the SurchargeCalculationResponse is retrieved
